none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 09, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Raw and weird, these midwest mutants floored me when I saw them last year. With a Pay To Cum-caliber drum/bass attack (and recording), a perfectly buzzed 1982 guitar and a high pitched alien whine fronting the whole thing, ACCELA deliver a deliberate mic drop over the course of six minutes. Aside from the vocals, this demo sounds like it's from another era - with the vocals, it sounds like it's from another planet. ACCELA

seo.title: Accela - Accela demo 2018 - Terminal Escape
